name: MMR (Meteor Moving Robot)
description:
MMR (Meteor Moving Robot) is a short puzzle game made with the limitation of "Movement is Lethal" and the theme of "Simulation".

You control a magnetic robot who has to push meteors into special batteries designed to extract their power.

Controls:
  • WASD or Arrow-Keys to move.
  • Space to push blocks
  • The menu is controlled with the mouse.
  • No gamepad support.
  • You may skip a Level with "Enter" or go back to a previous level with "Backspace".
  • Restart a level with "R"
Theme and Limitation:
  • Theme: The "Simulation" theme made me think of a computer simulation and that eventually made me think of robots, I know, the theme doesnt really fit that well lol!
  • Limitation: To win you need to push meteors, but when they move they leave behind a fiery trail that kills the player, therefore the movement of the meteors can be lethal. 
Notes and Suggestions:
  • Play the downloadable Windows version if possible for the best experience.
  • Full-screen mode is only available in the Windows version.
  • If the game window is too small for your screen, try zooming in a little bit and refreshing the page :)
  • If you are having trouble with a level but want to see what's ahead, don't hesitate on skipping that level, you can always go back to it later.
  • If for some reason you can't control the game in the web version, try reloading the page!
